articles.author: Matt Kew
articles.title: General Motors registers to join F1 as engine manufacturer from 2028 - Motorsport.com
articles.description: General Motors has formally registered with the FIA to join Formula 1 as a power unit manufacturer from the 2028 season.
articles.content:
Via its Cadillac sub-brand, automotive conglomerate GM is already eyeing an F1 presence in the shorter term by partnering with the Andretti bid to form an 11th team.
Andretti has gained FIA approval… [+1943 chars]
